attributes.action: Close all non-essential public places. And put Britain on lockdown for 1 month!!
attributes.additional_details: Because if you don’t your just killing people and not helping. I will say it again put us on lockdown
attributes.background: Realise that Britain needs to lockdown! And universities, schools and nurseries should close!!

rejection.details: The Government announced that schools, universities and colleges would close on 18 March, and a UK-wide lockdown was announced on Monday 23 March.
